main event: On April 19, 1962, a witness observed a bright, stationary object in the sky over Eureka, Utah, which was described as disc-shaped and emitting intense light.
interesting points: This sighting lasted for approximately 7 minutes,The object was described as having no visible features typical of man-made objects,The object disappeared suddenly with no discernible exhaust or sound,Witnesses reported similar sightings across multiple states,The investigation concluded with no definitive identification of the object.
location: Eureka, Utah, Rocky Mountain Area, USA
witness description: seven residents of Eureka, Utah reported similar observations and described the object as bright and hovering in the sky.
